name: The Cults and Extreme Belief Podcast

episodes.title: Cults and Extreme Belief S:1 | FLDS E:7 | AfterBuzz TV AfterShow
episodes.description: Juliet Vibert, Al Gregg, Mina Wahab, and Taylor Gates break down FLDS. Just who is prophet Warren Jeffs, and how has his imprisonment impacted his followers? How do current members defend the polygamy and pedophilia plaguing their group? And is there any hope for current members and apostates to band together to rebuild the struggling community? We talk all this and more on the seventh installment of Cults & Extreme Beliefs. (Here is the official page for the Lifetime movie Taylor referenced: https://www.mylifetime.com/movies/outlaw-prophet-warren-jeffs) The Cults & Extreme Beliefs After Show: Investigative journalist Elizabeth Vargas teams up with former members of controversial organizations to tell the stories of believers and leaders of cults in CULTS AND EXTREME BELIEFS. In our after show, we’re teaming up to explain the unbelievable stories revealed from those who’ve seen the other side of cult life. Tune in here for reviews, recaps and in-depth disc Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

episodes.title: Cults and Extreme Belief S:1 | Twelve Tribes E:6 | AfterBuzz TV AfterShow
episodes.description: AFTERBUZZ TV — Cults and Extreme Belief edition, is a weekly "after show" for fans of A&E's Cults and Extreme Belief. In this episode hosts Juliet Vibert and Al Gragg discuss episode 6. ABOUT CULTS & EXTREME BELIEF: In Cults and Extreme Belief, Elizabeth Vargas, alongside former members of controversial organizations, goes on a search to uncover how these sects use their influence to prey upon people’s desperation to create powerful and often destructive belief systems. Each episode will take an immersive look at one currently active group through the eyes of past devotees and get perspective from believers and leaders that are still inside.
